briefTitle: Study of Tadalafil Once-a Day for 12 Weeks in Men With Signs and Symptoms of Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, 5-Group, Multinational Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Dose Response, and Safety of Tadalafil Once-a-Day Dosing for 12 Weeks in Men With Signs and Symptoms of Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-design, multinational, 12-week study to compare the efficacy, dose response, and safety of tadalafil once a day versus placebo in men with signs and symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia, including lower urinary tract symptoms.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to 12 Week Endpoint in International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS): Primary Analysis
